product_name: Woods 2-Mantle Camp Lantern with Piezo - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Keep the camping festivities lively well after dark. Whether its a competitive game of Gin Rummy or preparing a late night meal, the 2-Mantel Camp Lantern offers just the right light.
short_description: Keep the camping festivities lively well after dark. Whether its a competitive game of Gin Rummy or preparing a late night meal, the 2-Mantel Camp Lantern offers just the right light.
